description: Move or rename files and directories. In PowerShell, this command is an alias of Move-Item. This documentation is based on the Command Prompt (cmd) version of move. More information: https://learn.microsoft.com/windows-server/administration/windows-commands/move.

useCases.description: View documentation of the equivalent PowerShell command:
Rename a file or directory when the target is not an existing directory:
Move a file or directory into an existing directory:
Move a file or directory across drives:
Do not prompt for confirmation before overwriting existing files:
Prompt for confirmation before overwriting existing files, regardless of file permissions:
